title: Seth Huot's Original Sponsor Me Tape
description: Seth Huot says, So when snowboarding started happening for me I always thought how sick it would be to ride for Volcom. Blue Montgomery asked me to ride for Capita in the fall of 2000, he asked which outerwear company I would like to get on, you know my a

asset.author: Volcom
asset.hookText: Seth Huot says, So when snowboarding started happening for me I always thought how sick it would be to ride for Volcom. Blue Montgomery asked me to ride for Capita in the fall of 2000, he asked which outerwear company I would like to get on, you know my answer. I had made a video with my friends the season prior and Blue sent my part to Jay Twitty the TM at the time for Volcom.
